title: Spiced Courgette on Toast
description: A luxurious breakfast, or light dinner - courgette on toast (and all of it’s wonderful variations) is a dish that I often make. It’s quick and cheap, healthy too. I recommend eating this with a soft boiled egg (cooked for 6 minutes in boiling water), alternatively, a few slices of fried paneer would also be an excellent addition.
ingredients: Half a medium sized courgette, grated
method: Sweat the onion until sweet and soft, 8-10 minutes. Stir occasionally to prevent the onions catching.
Add the garlic, chopped coriander stalks, chilli, 1 tbsp cumin and chopped ginger. Fry for a couple of minutes until the cumin is fragrant and garlic is golden.
Stir in the grated courgette and cook, stirring frequently, for about 5 minutes.
Place on top liberally buttered toast, scatter over the coriander leaves  and eat immediately.
